name: Madhura
greetingText: This day changed our lives forever.
wishText: May our bond grow stronger with each passing day.
textInChatBox: Happy Engagement Anniversary my love! Every moment with you is a dream come true.
text2: I thought of buying you something.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You mean the world to me
outroText: Come give me a hug if you liked it :)
replayText: Or click to relive the moment again.
